Name: Watson's Watch
About the game: A story driven game where the player assumes the role of a detective thrust into the middle of a series of disappearances on his relaxing vacation. Not only is the city of Watson’s Watch shrouded in mystery but so is our fearless detective. Unravel the story while dialogue interactions lead to its conclusion. Tick. Tock. Detective… Features Hours of Gameplay Dialogue heavy plot Custom Graphics Unique Design
